title: The new health bars
body: Honestly, i dont really like the new health bars, is there anyway to change the looks to prepatch?

replies.body: I like them because it's easier to read, very sharp and noticeable. I do understand the first couple games felt "odd" because it seemed to stand out against the art style but I've already grown to like it.
It'll take some getting used to but it's a clarity and readability improvement all round. Give it a few days and you won't even notice the difference.
Honestly, i also think it's a "fix" to the optimisation issues we were having, even though they didn't admit it.
Optimisation issues? What did I miss?
Games dropping to 5-20 FPS on even high end rigs (you could see it even in pro player games)
Ew gross. If that's recent though, the health bar changes have been on the PTS since season end, so may be unrelated. *shrug*
It was the second we got Pre-season that it could happen (not every game, just a few games)

Dunno, I haven't had any issues personally but I have seen a couple posts in H and S. It seems like this was a bigger scale preseason change that was planned for a while, but it's also possible that something that was put in to prep for the changes caused the issue. Do you know if it's fixed with this patch or?
I personally haven't noticed it this patch YET, but it seemed to be random anyway, so i don't know if that means it's fixed or not.
Ah fair enough, fingers crossed it's fixed then.
